job_history.work_description: Responsible for managing the employee relations functions for multiple business lines and business groups undergoing significant change. Responsible for designing and executing proactive employee relations plans and programs in accordance with internal policy and labor-law requirements with an acute focus on risk management strategies.

Support the company's value of People as a Competitive Advantage by supporting leaders to attract, develop, retain and motivate team members; provide tools and resources needed to succeed in their work; and influence a culture of responsibility and accountability for their businesses and functions.

job_history.role_name: Equal Employment Opportunity Consultant, Corporate Employee Relations
job_history.work_description: Developed, implemented and monitored company's affirmative action programs to ensure compliance with government regulations and consult with managers and HR professionals regarding AA/EEO policies and practices.

job_history.role_name: Corporate Diversity and Community Outreach Manager
job_history.work_description: Responsible for creating and implementing innovative employment strategies to establish a diverse candidate pool responsive to different business staffing needs.
Managed a team responsible for developing and implementing staffing programs for the Manager and Supervisor Training Program in CBG.
Partnered with teaching and support staff to provide proactive programs focused on developing academic and social skills for college students with diverse backgrounds.

skills.name: Employee Relations
skills.explanation: Has extensive experience in managing employee relations functions, designing and executing proactive plans and programs, and providing tools and resources to support leaders and team members, indicating expert-level mastery.

skills.name: Risk Management
skills.explanation: Has experience with risk management strategies in the context of employee relations, showing strong proficiency.

skills.explanation: Has experience with labor-law requirements and ensuring compliance, suggesting strong proficiency.

skills.name: Diversity and Inclusion
skills.explanation: Has experience with affirmative action programs, diversity and community outreach, and creating innovative employment strategies, showing strong proficiency.

skills.name: Leadership
skills.explanation: Has experience leading teams and providing guidance to leaders and team members, indicating strong proficiency.

skills.name: Recruitment

skills.name: Training and Development

skills.name: Counseling
skills.explanation: Has experience as an Education Specialist, but the role seems more focused on education and academic support rather than counseling, suggesting some practical experience.
